DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy buccal misoprostol cervical priming laminaria prim among woman undergo D & E 13-20 week gestation Western Cape Province , South Africa
DOC.detailed_description: As misoprostol increasingly use cervical preparation , concern use proportion woman expel fetus prior D & E side effect mean rigorous data possible advantage osmotic dilator need . To address gap literature , propose perform RCT compare two method cervical preparation prior D & E : 1 . Misoprostol 400 mcg administer buccally approximately 3-6 hour prior D & E , repeat 3 hour first dose ( modify version current protocol ) 2 . Laminaria tent insert cervix 18 24 hour prior D & E
